statements: DELETE FROM appointments WHERE client_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE reminder_id = 100 AND assistant_name = 'John Doe' AND reminder_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE client_id = 5 AND reminder_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM user_appointments WHERE user_id = 1 AND appointment_id = 5;
DELETE FROM assistants WHERE specialization = 'General' AND user_id IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'john@example.com');
